question: Which image of the human heart muscle was produced by fluorescent microscopy?
description: The first image shows a microscopic view of cells with visible nuclei and cell walls, stained in shades of purple and pink. The second image displays a close-up view of cellular structures, including what appears to be mitochondria and other organelles, highlighted in yellow and pink against a gray background. The third image features a colorful, abstract pattern of dots in various colors such as blue, orange, and yellow, scattered across a black background, resembling a starry sky or a molecular structure visualization.
